name: keepLight
desc: Light will keep on the tile to next level, grinch would not be generated on it.

name: knownEvilPays
desc: When find the ring bell, all revealed grinch give 1 gift

name: churchRing
desc: when find the ring bell, all grinch adjacent to church would reveal itself

name: patternRecognition
desc: when you open 3 safe tile in sequence, get a gift

name: familiarSteet
desc: at the beginning of a level, randomly reveal a hint tile

name: greedIsGood
desc: when reveal the last safe tile, add 1 coin

name: lastChance
desc: when you only have 1 hp, you get gift doubles

name: steadyHand
desc: when you light on a safe tile, reveal an adjacent safe tile

name: peacefulNight
desc: when reveal the last tile, heal 1 hp

name: steetSense
desc: when start a level, will notify if there is grinch in revealable tiles.

name: lateMending
desc: when reveal a grinch without using light, reveal a safe tile adjacent

name: last Light
desc: if flashLight more than one when go to next level, keep one
